attributes.additional_details:
Every day we hear that Jihadist's are returning to the UK....but why? Are they organising terrorism over here, on our towns, cities or streets. I speak for many people,  but all for one why aren't we stopping them from returning?

We deport foreigners for petty crimes such as theft or misilanius crimes.

We do not want fighters coming back to glorify faith killings. We don't hear of our soldiers doing the same.

We need to remove all Jihadist fighters so that our streets and homes are safe for our children to be children.

Please support this for a safer UK a beter UK.

WE ARE GREAT BRITAIN!
